name: Orthagalious
description:
The newest model space-debris cleanup ship, the Orthagalious (pictured below), is ready to take flight! the pathing is automated, so you don't have to worry about flight, but don't think it'll be easy! you'll still have to manage the reactor cooling systems and laser beam cannons to survive for as long as you can against wicked alien spaceships and increasingly deadly meteors! Good luck, and god speed. 

*only available for windows desktop

made in Godot
